title: The Realm of Water Fantasy Pack
description: This is a music pack featuring one-hundred eighty three Fantasy Cues. Utilizing orchestral effects, all of the pieces within this asset pack are versatile enough to use across a wide variety of projects.
longDescription:
Music composer, Living Force is proud to present The Realm Of Water Fantasy Pack! This is an asset pack that contains one hundred eighty-three orchestral instrumentals geared towards the world of fantasy. The pieces are loopable for desired cut scenes, action sequences, menus, and transitions for your projects.
